fi.tamk.tiko.engine.system

Class GameAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.tiko.engine.system.GameAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class GameAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    GameAdapter for handling game running. This class starts new thread used for handling game running.
    Since:
    1.8
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jani Timonen
